name: Cornmeal Waffles
author: DOE2
summary: These delicious whole wheat and cornmeal waffles have a light crunchy texture. Serve hot with syrup, or fruit and whipped cream.
directions: Preheat a waffle iron, and coat with cooking spray
In a medium bowl, stir together the whole wheat flour, cornmeal, sugar, baking powder and baking soda
Make a well in the center, and stir in the buttermilk just until smooth
In a separate bowl, whip egg whites with an electric mixer until thick enough to hold a soft peak
Carefully fold the egg whites into the batter
Spoon batter onto the hot waffle iron in an amount appropriate for your iron
Close, and cook until the iron stops steaming, and the waffles are golden brown
